Virus hits major WA Aboriginal communityMichael RamseyAAPThu, 24 February 2022 10:08AM
Western Australia's largest remote Aboriginal community has been plunged into COVID-19 lockdown as the state recorded 617 new cases.
Seventeen infections have been ...

217.title: Murder-accused NT cop's trial to resume
217.previewText:
A Northern Territory policeman's trial for the murder of an Aboriginal teenager during a failed outback arrest is set to resume.
Constable Zachary Rolfe, 30, has pleaded not guilty to murdering Kumanjayi Walker after he was stabbed with a pair of sci ...
